page.title: 17Social Concerns
page.content: Crowscarers are machines that make loud noises to scare off birds if they are eating crops which they should not.The problem is that they can wake up people at night if they are not switched off. There is a law that you are not allowed to have a crowscarer on after 7.00pm or on a Sunday,but some people still put them on. Footpaths:There are about 5 footpaths in our area but a lot of the farmers block them off by shutting gates or by growing crops in the way.Every year a lot of people walk on the footpaths and if something is in the way they trample it down. Parking:The parking problem in Little Addington is by the publichouse "The Bell.Since the new owners arrived there have been more cars,but the car park is too small.So they park on the grass verge.They are spoiling the village.
